summary: I was inspired by the mod that adds a half human, half dragon race into skyrim a their very own city called Draconis
descriptionHtml:
I am a novice at the creation kit but I am learning quickly so if you are willing to help out on the mod my e-mail is lucyluc17@hotmail.com, and with your help we will come up with a great mod and if you have any great moddels send them to me and I will tell you what I think.

This is my progress at the moment.
. Draconis Royal Palace (structure 50%) (clutter 5%)
. Draconis Upper city
-Taverns (0%)
-Houses (0%)
-Shops (0%)
-streets (0%)
-Drakian councel house (0%)
.Draconis Lower city
 -Taverns (0%)
-Houses (0%)
-Shops (0%)
-slums (0%)
. Draconis main gate (0%)
author: Warlord170
